episodes.synopsis: An outstanding all-star cast vividly brings to life the epic story of Jesus Christ, beginning with the arrangements for Joseph and Mary's wedding.
episodes.title: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In the dramatic conclusion, Jesus faces crucifixion after he's charged with blasphemy for allegedly performing miracles and claiming he's the messiah.
episodes.title: Part 2

video.title: Jesus of Nazareth
video.synopsis: Featuring an impressive international cast, this well-received TV miniseries respectfully and sensitively documents the life of Jesus Christ.
